replies.body: Try screenflow 6 to record. And Final Cut Pro X to edit. And compressor to render. I'm using these and quality is awesome. Screenflow almost makes u lose no fps. You can get these easily and free over uTorrent. Try to find a link in YouTube for screenflow. And compressor and final cut are on uTorrent sites.
